CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, page 21, reads: "The Philip Morris Company booth is shown here with representative, Tom Shropshire, Miss Nelle Reinstein, co-owner of Karol's Dress Shoppe, who supplied the gowns for the wedding; Mrs. Robert L. Vann, president of the Courier, and John Carroll, local manager."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Tom Shropshire, Nelle Reinstein, Jessie Vann, and John Carroll, standing beside Philip Morris Cigarette display in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
